comments.body: Deepti is really friendly and girish you can enjoy in his class, all the best with Sheela Devi she ain't that great irritating sometimes

Shilpa ma'am is pretty average 

Deepti C ma'am is amazing   
Sheela Devi Ma'am is below average & Gauri ma'am is great 

Dr Richa is good and Dr Girish VR is good only if you pay attention
